full_threads.body:
@rica Confirming this is now done. https://www.cruiseworldholidays.com.au/bravo-2020/

@jona +15mins Thanks!
@joel assigning this ticket back to you as there are additional request from client. Thanks!

Thanks Health!

The changes look fantastic! We are really loving how it's coming together.

Suzie and I are just making a list of the last few changes and will come back to you on Wednesday.

If you can just make one quick change for me that I would prefer not hang onto as it looks odd on the page that would be great!

When you click the Read me section on the pages it opens up another landing page which is where the Get a free quote option was. Can you pop it back into these pages as it is pulling through some odd next now. In short I would like the get a free quote and search function to appear on all the landing pages under Cruise options. Make sense?

I have added some images so it's hopefully clear.

Get a Free Quote and search on this page



Replace the odd text on the right hand side with Get a Free Quote Today and add search at bottom of page.



Any issues Health let me know!

Thanks heaps

Amanda

Best Regards,

Once done, can you please let the client know. No rush, can be done Monday if need be. Cheers!

Hi Amanda, 

Just an update, we have completed all of the below and are just working on the Search box on each of the landing pages to appear at the bottom. 

Regarding a privacy policy, that is entirely possible, but up to you guys. If you would like us to set it up, just let us know the details and we can action. 

Have a great weekend!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Health, Thanks for all your changes it looks great so far!! Just a few small comments:
  • I am not a fan of the orange. I get the need for this to stand out but I don't feel that it ties in with cruising. Any other ideas on this? I thought perhaps an ocean background?
  • The cruise logos under the boxes are black and white. We would prefer them to be the colour logos. Although in saying that are these necessary? The uniworld one is colour and looks like a page not a logo?
  • I noticed that the CLIA logo I sent you isn't in the footer. Was this logo ok to use?
Below is the information that we needed to provide on the remaining changes. I haven't included the Solo Traveller Deal as we are still sourcing this. Can you set this page up with the Search Function and Get a Free quote etc. as the other landing pages and perhaps pop a note 'coming soon' and I will send the details through asap.
  • Remove Publish Dates from all content
  • Headings under Cruise options should be in alphabetical order:
    • Carnival Cruises
    • Christmas Cruises
    • Disney Cruise Line
    • Exclusive Sailings
    • Hot Deals - remove content and have link only (see below note).
    • Music Cruises
    • New Years Eve Cruises
    • P&O Cruises
    • River Cruising
    • School Holidays Cruises
    • Solo Traveller Deals
  • The landing pages under Cruise options should have the search function at the bottom of the page and then the cruise 'Get a Free quote today' option on the side to replace the current text. I have attached a sample I put together for you.
  • Hot Deals landing page. So this is the URL https://www.go.cruising.com.au/cruise-world-holidays/hot-deals?_ga=2.58729957.958200127.1591749424-539852910.1583982864 to the Hot Deals section on our white label site. Can this be linked to our Hot deals headings? So it opens the link on our white label site. This would save us having to update this section as it is maintained by our supplier. If this is possible I would also like to have a box on the front page 'Packaged Deals' and then use this URL https://www.go.cruising.com.au/cruise-world-holidays/package-holidays
  • Boxes for front page ( 4 in total - Hot Deals, Music Cruises, Packaged Deals, Latest in Cruise)
  • Hot Deals URL above - https://www.go.cruising.com.au/cruise-world-holidays/hot-deals?_ga=2.58729957.958200127.1591749424-539852910.1583982864
  • Music Cruises URL - https://pro.cruising.com.au/swift/cruise?siid=207117&searchcruise=1&lang=7&cruiseline=8299&destinationtype=All
    • Logos for this box are attached in the Zip folder. You will need to use 3 logos for this box. Bravo, Rock the Boat and Cruisin' Country Please can you use the CC2020 logo for country (there are 2 different options).
  • Packaged Deals URL - https://www.go.cruising.com.au/cruise-world-holidays/package-holidays
  • Latest in Cruise URL - https://www.go.cruising.com.au/cruise-world-holidays/promotions
  • Not sure where to put Customer reviews - any thoughts on this? I don't want it taking up a whole box on the front page but not really sure where it should go.
  • Also we need to add a Terms of Trade landing page and link. I was thinking this could go in the footer section. What do you think? I am just finalising the wording so expect to have this ready by early next week.
  • In regards to Privacy notes etc.. Do we need something like this?? By signing up, you agree to the Helloworld Travel online Privacy Notice and Privacy Policy. This note is from our Helloworld website.
I think that's it for now. We will come back to you with the Solo Traveller deal asap and the Terms of Trade. Best Regards, Amanda Marshall | Senior Consultant/Assistant Manager Helloworld Travel RevesbyGround Floor, Revesby Workers Club, 2B Brett Street PO Box 629, Revesby NSW 2212 T: 02 9772 2066 F: 02 9772 2114 E: amanda.revesby@helloworld.com.au : https://www.helloworld.com.au/store/revesby : https://www.facebook.com/helloworldrevesby/ :https://www.helloworld.com.au/store/revesby/ ABN: 17108087430 Appointments are encouraged to ensure all our clients receive the best possible service. I am available Monday, Tuesday and Thursday 9:00am-5:30pm Please don't keep me a secret, your referrals are my greatest compliment. "Without a travel agent you're on your own" For all passengers travelling overseas, ALL passports require 6 months validity from the return date back into Australia. Any queries please do not hesitate to contact me. Travel insurance is strongly recommended by the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade for all overseas travel. For up to date overseas travel information, we recommend you visit the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade (DFAT) website or call toll free on 1300 139 281.
